Name: ArbyG
Text: Ah, BLIP! Good to see you again!

Name: ArbyG
Text: Oh, this always happens. I guess your memory didn't survive the last one!

Name: ArbyG
Text: Not to worry! I'll explain! The computer we are in needs a reboot, it crashed...

Name: ArbyG
Text: You are the Bits Logistics Implementation Program, or BLIP for short!

Name: ArbyG
Text: It's your job to give the right instructions to the reset FILE to reboot it!

Name: ArbyG
Text: ...and the right instructions to every FILE along the way...

Name: ArbyG
Text: Well, let's get to it. Your base program has the CONVEYOR BELT and the MINER...

Name: ArbyG
Text: The FILE to the left will get us into the next area. Hover your cursor on it to see what it needs.

Name: ArbyG
Text: Should be easy, right? I mean, you're literally built for it...

Name: ArbyG
Text: How rude of me.. I'm RBG, the graphics, or something. Call me ArbyG!

Name: ArbyG
Text: You can ask me for tips if you need to. I've watched you do this a few times...
